works.description:
Daily Deal Media is the leading resource for news,  
data and intelligence for Social Commerce and the Daily Deal industry.  We
 
employee a staff of writers and reporters that report on the daily deal  
industry, that work full time for us, and are paid salaries to produce  
daily content.

Shobb.com has been stealing our content on a daily basis and posting it on
 
their website as their own work.  We will be pursuing them with every
legal  
option available to us and plan on following up our cease and desist
letter  
with a civil suit for monetary damages.

Important notes:

1.  Shobb.com does NOT have permission from Daily Deal Media LLC, or any  
our executive team or writing staff - to post our content.

2.  We have tried contacting shobb.com 3 times in the past 4 weeks about  
removing our content from their website.  They have chosen to ignore us
and  
not respond to any of our inquires.

3.  We have many readers that have alerted us about this company, and  
expressed the confusion that it creates in the marketplace.

4.  By stealing and copying our content - shobb.com is hurting Daily Deal 

Media's SEO and marketing attempts and causing Daily Deal Media monetary  
loss by distributing our stolen work to their site visitors.

5.  We have sent shobb.com a cease and desist letter - which again they  
choose to ignore:

Dear shobb.com,

It has come to our attention that you are republishing original content  
from dailydealmedia.com on your Website, located at shobb.com.

Your unauthorized use of original material from dailydealmedia.com is in  
violation of copyrights owned by dailydealmedia.com. If you do not  
immediately remove the copyrighted material from shobb.com, and notify us 

in writing that you have done so, we will have no choice but to pursue  
legal action against you. We require the copyrighted material to be
removed  
and written notice given that such has been removed, by no later than June
 
20th, 2011.

Sincerely,

Eric Meyer, President
Daily Deal Media LLC
